body:
After some heartache pretty sure I've found an issue where adiabatic surfaces become outdoor surfaces after being modified by the rotateHBObj component. I found this in personal analysis and the example file used in Chris's Performance.Network presentation on parametric energy modeling.



Attached is the referenced file from Performance.Network

replies.body: That is not a bug but how the component is designed to be. At the same time I understand that it can be confusing. Chris is working on a solution to make keeping/removing the boundary condition as an option. Read more here: [https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/honeybee/issues/615#issuecommen...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/honeybee/issues/615#issuecomment-290246698)
